title: Fun with permissions: Why the change in Android 6.0 may make you repeat yourself
text:
Fun with permissions: Why the change in Android 6.0 may make you repeat yourself 
Published By: AndroidCentral.com - Today 
In switching to a runtime permissions model in Android 6.0 — you're no longer giving access to your data just by installing an app — d...
